name: EgVenture
description:
INTRODUCTION

Three eggs were sleeping in their cosy nest, Suddenly, a curious fox crept up, and pushed one egg! The egg plummeted down to the scary ground. It is YOUR mission to embark on an adventure to help it get back up to safety while traversing the land with mushrooms and avoiding foxes, thorns, lumberjacks! Good luck!

CREDITS

Thanks to my friend Ian and my brother for playtesting the game!

Most of the game was made by me lol (Includes all art, code and sound effects)

Main menu and end screen music by:  TinyWorlds

Cut Scene music by:  skrjablin

Main music by: bart

Tools

Construct 3 for the main game

Aseprite for all the art

Chiptone for generating sound effects

OpenGameArt for sourcing the music
